title: Interpretation of a dream about deafness in a dream - a vision of deafness in a dream

preview.html: Being deaf in a dream, the meaning of a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of dreams, interpretation of a dream of silence, interpretation of deafness in a dream, being deaf in a dream is a deficiency in religion, and God Almighty said regarding the unbelievers: I am deaf, O blind. To dream that you are deaf indicates your inability to convince others with your way of thinking and use it for your own benefit. A slippery road with your tongue. For a deaf person, this dream means false friends. A dream about deafness in a dream: A person may see in a dream that he is deaf and cannot hear, and the meaning of this dream is that this person cannot interpret things and does not know how to evaluate things or is unable to evaluate situations, It is also suggested that this person is exposed to a wide range of problems and fears. Interpretation of deafness in one dream. Dream interpretation scholars say: When an unmarried girl sees that she has become deaf in her dream, this indicates that she is giving license to bad people and it may also indicate that she will marry an unlucky person. She will meet a stupid person in her life. As it is said in the dream, the interpretation of deafness and deafness in the dream of an unmarried woman, and this indicates that she will meet a person who has no religion or will, and if she sees that she is married to a deaf man, this indicates that she will suffer from the worries of this marriage, but If she sees that she is carrying a deaf child, this indicates that she will marry someone who will do a lot of good in her life, and it also portends a happy near future. Interpretation of deafness in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she cannot hear and is deaf and does not distinguish any sound, this means that she is safe from harm and protected from all harm. Managing her household affairs forcefully. Deafness and deafness in a pregnant woman’s sleep. Jurists in dream interpretation say that seeing muteness and deafness in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that God will save her from pain and disorder. Deafness in a man’s dream. If one sees in a dream that he is deaf, this indicates a weak will and that he cannot Performing the tasks assigned to him. Interpretation of the ear in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about black insects

preview.html: When we see black insects in a dream, we imagine that they carry a bad meaning or an unpleasant sign, but through the following lines we learn from gptafser.com/ the meaning and meaning of this vision in a dream. Interpretation of seeing black insects in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees black insects in a dream In a dream, this is a bad sign. According to the consensus of scholars, she is dealing with a major delusion, and that she is going through many crises on her way. It could be a sign of failure in emotional matters. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream with black insects may mean that she will live an unmarried life. Successful in the future. If a girl sees in a dream, black insects of the harmful type. This indicates that she is bad company and knows the evil in them. But if he sees in a dream that he was able to escape from these insects. This indicates that she will be able to achieve her desires and ambitions in Life and God knows best. But if an unmarried girl sees black insects in a dream, she can reach them and bite them. This is an indication that this girl has an enemy who carries malice and hatred and is close to her. Therefore, if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that an insect has taken over her. She should To beware of every man close to her or far from her in her relationship with him. See also: A black spider in a dream. Interpretation of seeing black insects in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees black insects in a dream. This is an indication of many problems that she is facing at the present time. The vision indicates Black insects for a married woman indicate a lot of anxiety and distress surrounding her. And if a married woman sees that she was able to get rid of these black insects in a dream. This indicates that she will achieve all her hopes and aspirations, God Almighty willing. And if she sees in a dream that she was able to kill these black insects This is a sign that he will emerge from all marital crises, and it will pass soon. And if you see in a dream that you are working on cleaning the house from black insects. This is a sign that the evil that he was facing in the house will go away forever. And if a married lady sees a lot of insects Hair in a dream. This indicates that she is one of the righteous and has a good reputation. If a married woman sees many malicious insects in her dream. The dream indicates that there are many people around her who mistreat her and do not love her, and God knows best. But when she sees insects and spiders, this is an indication that her husband does not enjoy With good qualities. And if you see in a dream that an insect stung her and you were able to get it. A sign that another woman is trying to steal her husband and disrupt her family life. Interpretation of seeing black insects in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a man sees black insects, this is a sign of a marital crisis on his way. If a man sees in a dream that he is keeping away from black insects, this means that he will be free from crises. If a man sees a beetle in a dream, this indicates his tyranny. If a man sees a gecko in his dream, this indicates the presence of a good wife. If a man sees a scorpion In a dream, this is a sign of the bad ways of the owner

title: Interpretation of a snake in a dream

preview.html: Whether it is large or small, all specifications will be mentioned through the gptafser.com website, and we will interpret the vision according to the condition and gender of the person having the vision. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a single girl: A snake in a dream, for a single girl, is one of the signs that indicates that she is always thinking a lot and dealing with Things that may not be important. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees the skin of a snake in her dream. The dream may indicate the happiness that she will obtain in the near future, God willing. The presence of a snake in an unmarried girl’s house in a dream. A sign of the presence of an envious or spiteful person, and it could be To be an enemy, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. Seeing a water snake in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of marriage or engagement. There may be a new job or a job that she finds. A black snake in an unmarried girl’s dream is one of the signs of the genie. Whoever sees such a man must To read the Holy Qur’an a lot. Dreaming of seeing a black snake in a dream with one girl. It indicates the presence of an enemy hiding in his vision and he must be careful. A snake bite in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she will suffer some harm from someone. This depends on the type and shape of the snake, To find out who is doing evil, whether it is a relative or a friend. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a snake crawling over her in a dream. Because there is harm in one of the people that may soon befall her, and God is Most High. Whereas if A married woman dreamed of a black snake in her house. The vision indicates that there is someone who loses her and hates her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Since seeing a black snake is one of the most indicative indicators of the enemy. Seeing a large black snake in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the presence of a hidden enemy, but Very close to him, so he comes to warn, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a small black snake in a married woman’s home can be interpreted. It is a dream that indicates a problem that may arise in her life. It could be caused by someone she does not know, and God knows best. It has been said that seeing a black snake in a married woman’s dream It represents marital problems that you may encounter, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees a soft snake in a dream, this is a sign of pregnancy that will come after a long wait. When a married woman sees that there is a snake in her house and she tried to escape in a dream. She must be careful, as this Evidence that there is someone creating problems between her and her husband, or there may be problems between the parents, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a man and its meaningWhen a married man sees a snake and is not afraid of it in a dream. The vision can indicate strength of character and overcoming difficulties Associated with the character of that person. The vision of raising snakes in a married man’s dream can be interpreted. However, he has a lot of power that makes him do what he wants, or it may be the position he holds that makes him do what he wants. The big black snake in a married man’s dream. Which is Evidence of the existence of a great enemy who can harm him, and God is Greater and All-Knowing. If a married man sees a snake and kills it

title: Interpretation of pronouncing the Shahada in a dream - I bear witness that the dream has no god but God

preview.html: The dream of speaking the Shahada indicates success, excellence, and the end of worry, and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, and divorced girl, and the unmarried and married young man, in terms of hearing the Shahada, writing or reading the Shahada, and reading the Shahada after the death of Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of the Shahada in a dream Seeing the two Shahadas pronounced in a dream and raising the indicator from Its most important meanings: obtaining a degree, graduating from academic levels, and reaching the goal. It indicates imminent satisfaction and victory over enemies, and indicates that the dreamer is one of the monotheists of God Almighty, and indicates good intentions and transcendence, and is a gift to the dreamer and whoever sees him. It is goodness and happiness, and whoever sees pronouncing the Shahada in a dream, it is good news of relief and livelihood. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the interpretation of his dream that if a person sees in a dream that he is pronouncing the Shahada, then this vision may indicate that good news, glad tidings, and joyful events will soon arrive for him, and it also heralds good, livelihood. . A lot of money comes to him, but if a person sees in a dream a dead person speaking a testimony, then this vision may indicate that the deceased has a high and great position in God Almighty. And when a person sees in a dream that he is reciting the two testimonies and bearing witness, this vision may indicate that God is with him, protecting him and taking care of him. From any calamity or sadness that befalls him. In his dream that he is bearing witness and that he is a politician, this vision shows comfort in obtaining many good deeds and aid. And the next money: Interpretation of the tashahhud in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees the tashahhud in her dream. This vision may indicate the arrival of happy news that will make her happy and joyful. It also indicates the imminent date of her marriage to someone she loves and loves, and she will live a happy life full of joy with her husband. Interpretation of the tashahhud in a dream for a married woman. A married woman. She sees the Tashahhud in her dream. This vision may indicate the stability of her married life and her happy life with her husband. It also indicates an imminent and new pregnancy, and it will show her and her husband a lot of goodness, sustenance, and money. Interpretation of the tashahhud in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who sees the tashahhud in a dream may indicate the vagina and the imminent date of birth, and her baby will be in good health, while seeing the testimony of the witness may indicate liberation. Of worries and problems. And heartaches that she faces with her husband, and she will live a happy life with him with the arrival of the new baby. Interpretation of the tashahhud in a dream for a man. If a married man sees the tashahhud in a dream, this vision may indicate that he will get rid of all the worries, problems, and difficulties that he faces in his life, and his whole life will improve for the better. As for seeing the tashahhud in the dream of an unmarried young man, perhaps That means his wedding date. He approaches a very kind and moral girl. When a person sees in a dream that he is reciting the Shahada while crying a lot, this vision may indicate his intense desire to get rid of all the sins, transgressions and forbidden things he has committed, and to repent to God Almighty, while he sees a sick person. Whoever recites the Tashahhud in a dream may indicate that the time of his recovery is approaching, and that he is in good health. By saying, “I bear witness that the dream has no god but God.”

title: Interpretation of a dream about the name Rizq in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Rizq in a dream is one of the names with beautiful meanings, so below we learn about the interpretation of a dream about the name Rizq in a dream according to what scholars have narrated and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about the name Rizq in a dream Interpretation of a dream about the name Rizq in a dream could be an indication of kindness, giving, and God. The highest knowledgeable, where seeing the name Rizq expresses the livelihood he will obtain, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event that an unmarried girl sees the name Rizq, this may indicate happiness, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a married man, the name Rizq may indicate divine providence, and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Mahmoud In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about the name Mahmoud in a dream indicates goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees the name Mahmoud, this may mean her freedom from worries, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees the name Mahmoud, it may express the achievement of goals, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the name Mahmoud can also express goodness. When a single girl sees the name Muhammad, it may indicate that you follow the Sunnah of the Prophet and religious teachings, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about a child vomiting

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a child vomitingInterpretation of a dream about a child vomiting in a dream To reach the search and even get the correct interpretation of this dream, so all you have to do is follow the interpretation of the dream below, where the interpretation of vomiting in a dream depends on many clues.. The fortune teller and whether he is married or not We will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a child vomiting through this article on the site. Various interpretations of a dream about a child vomiting on his clothes. The interpretation of a dream about a child vomiting on his clothes indicates the remorse of the viewer. If the child’s vomit is black, this means that the student regrets the sins he committed in the past. If The dreamer is rich and sees a child vomiting blood, then money is forbidden in the dreamer’s money. If a child vomits blood in the dream and the dreamer is poor, this means that he will become rich and God will provide him with abundant supplies. If a child vomits in a dream and the intestines come out of the vomit, this means that someone close Whoever sees it will die. Interpretation of a dream about a child vomiting on my clothes: This indicates that the dreamer is committing sins and bad deeds and must repent. Seeing a child vomiting in a dream and the fortuneteller knows this child in reality, the vision may indicate that this child suffers from jealousy and evil in reality and it is recommended to carry the child Correctly to protect him. One of the most clear and common opinions regarding the interpretation of a dream about a child vomiting on my clothes is that he is practicing sin and immorality in reality, and his fears are many. If a righteous person sees in a dream a child vomiting on his clothes, this may mean that he will achieve an increase in profits and material benefits. There are also some interpretations that last until the child vomits on clothes in a dream, indicating the disappearance of the fortuneteller’s worries after he repents of his sins and earning illegal money. If he sees If one dreams that a child does not know about vomiting on his clothes, this may indicate that an intelligent person will face difficulties and challenges in his marital or professional life. The dream interpretation of a child vomiting on my clothes while washing them and returning to cleanliness again during sleep indicates that the student will atone for his sins. If a person sees in a dream that one of his children is vomiting on his clothes, this may mean the death of that child or one of his siblings. If a mother sees one of her children vomiting during her sleep, this may indicate that the child is affected by witchcraft or jealousy. Interpretation of vomiting in a dream by Imam Al-Usaimi. Imam Al-Osaimi sees Whoever vomits in a dream with his consent shows his sincere repentance, but if he vomits with effort and hatred, this means that his repentance is not sincere. Imam Al-Usaimi explained that seeing the same person in a dream vomiting while fasting indicates the presence of a large number of debts that the seeker can pay but does not want to. He sees himself in a dream drinking milk and vomiting honey, then it indicates his righteousness and the righteousness of his repentance. If he eats pearls and vomits honey, this means that he is a pious person, and has a lot of legal and executive knowledge. If a person is in good health and sees him vomiting due to an illness in a dream, this means that he is in In reality, he is being pursued by an enemy who may escape from him soon. Vomiting may indicate that the dreamer is wasting his money in vain. If a person sees in a dream that he is vomiting and it is not...

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about lizards according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Complete interpretations of the interpretation of a dream about a gecko. The interpretation of a dream about geckos in a dream is very bad, especially if a gecko bites the dreamer or if it is larger than its usual size, but when the fortuneteller kills him in the dream, he triumphs over his enemies, and if you want to discover more secrets of interpreting the gecko symbol, you must read the paragraphs The following is because it is full of interpretations given by leading jurists. Follow it. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretations of a dream about a gecko. When Imam Al-Sadiq spoke about geckos or lizards in a dream, he gave a general interpretation of them and other secondary interpretations that fall within this general interpretation. He said that a leper is a person who has many undesirable traits in his personality. He loves the world without limits and restrictions. As for the individual meanings related to the interpretation of leprosy, they differ from one dreamer to another, as follows: Employee: It is known that many problems appear in different workplaces, but the appearance of leprosy on the wall or on the desk located within the area in which Working as a fortune teller, he is an enemy of his colleagues who conspire against him and continue to carry out dirty schemes for distances. The relationship between the dreamer and his superiors until he leaves the place. Unrelated: When a young man sees leprosy in his dream, it can be interpreted as an old enemy or a woman who satisfies her satanic desires with adultery and wants this forbidden behavior from the dreamer so that a large gap arises between him and God because of it. Immorality and God forbid. Married / Married: The presence of a large number of geckos in a married man’s dream, and their colors vary and their size is large, because he is hated, and his enemies may enter his life, and perhaps the dream is interpreted as his enemies being his. A house or by his relatives. Interpretation of a dream about a gecko by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin hated seeing geckos in a dream, and said that they indicate people with a weak spirit and people who go astray and enjoy evil and sins. And if the dreamer sees a group of geckos gathering around him, then they are false friends who want to instill in the dreamer Paths of falsehood and forbidden things, as they keep him away from the path of God and His Messenger. When a married woman sees her husband’s head turning into the head of a leper or completely turning into a leper in a dream, then she is an immoral adulterer and does not fear God’s punishment. Perhaps seeing a black leprosy in a dream in a strange way means that the dreamer is fascinated by magic. The intense, black color of leprosy is a metaphor for black magic and its evil dangers to people. This scene can be an immediate warning for the dreamer to take care of his health, because he may contract leprosy in the near future. An increase in leprosy in the dreamer's house is interpreted by many temptations and disobedience spreading in the house, as the devil tempts His organs and desires cause a person to fall into a sea of ​​sins and lose him. His relationship with God Almighty. When a gecko is seen in a dream, they represent people whose primary concern is demolishing the house, separating the woman from her husband, and corrupting the morals of the people of the house, whether they are youth or children. If the bewitched and possessed one sees a leper coming out of his house and his own room, these are joys that will come to him

title: Removing part of a tooth in a dream

preview.html: Therefore, searching for the results of the vision prompts them to know whether it is a praiseworthy or unpleasant vision, and we will learn about this through the following article from our website explaining it. Follow us.Interpretation of seeing part of a tooth removed in a dream for a single girl. Seeing part of a tooth removed for a single girl in a dream. It indicates the girl’s separation or distance from someone close to her, whether by distance or death. It can also indicate removing a tooth for a single girl in a dream. To expose the girl to problems, troubles and difficulties in her life. Her psychological state will deteriorate and soon these problems will end and her life will stabilize, God willing. Removing part of a tooth in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her failure to achieve her dreams, ambitions and goals. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is pulling her tooth. It indicates the separation of some of the loved ones in her heart. Or she will break off her engagement next time if she gets engaged. If an unmarried girl sees that her tooth was removed by the doctor without pain or suffering in the dream. This was an indication of her relationship with a person of high standing and status, and it may end. This relationship is related to marriage. But if she feels pain when her teeth come out in a dream, then the dream is a sign of talents and problems that she faces from her family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about front teeth falling out. Interpretation of seeing part of a molar removed in a dream for a married woman. Removing a molar for a married woman means that she heard The good and happy news. The stability of her married life and away from family problems and quarrels. The dream of removing part of a tooth in a dream is good news about pregnancy. If she does not have children, and wants to, she will do so, God willing. Removing a tooth for a married woman in a dream means that she will Free from trouble. Family disputes and the beginning of a new period of stability and psychological peace, God willing. While removing a tooth in a dream for a married woman, this may indicate the woman’s separation from one of her relatives. It may be a relative or a friend, and this separation may be distance or death, and God knows best. Seeing a tooth falling out in a married woman’s dream means that she is afflicted with a serious illness. Interpretation of seeing part of a tooth being removed in a dream for a man and its meaning: A married man removing part of his tooth in a dream. It indicates that he heard happy news that changed his life from one stage to a better stage, such as a promotion in His job and winning a high position. Removing part of a married man’s molar in a dream could be a sign that he will get rid of his problems, crises and difficulties that have hindered his life for a long time, and the beginning of a new life is a stage of stability and psychological peace. Seeing the removal of part of a molar in a married man’s dream. May There will be a good chance for his wife to become pregnant and give birth to her in the near future, God willing. Removing part of a tooth in a dream for a married man may indicate a bad psychological state that arose from reasons such as losing money. Or losing a friend or relative through separation or death. Read also: Interpretation Dreaming of teeth falling out, meaning of seeing part of a tooth removed in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation: seeing part of a tooth removed

title: Interpretation of a dream about a fetus emerging from the abdomen for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Therefore, many are looking for the meaning of this dream, and our website will provide a translator in the following lines with details about the interpretation of this vision. Interpretation of a dream about a fetus coming out of the womb in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the fetus coming out of her womb. This is good news that she will marry a religious man and enjoy her life with him. As for if the girl sees the male fetus, he will come out of her stomach in a dream. The meaning of the good news reaching her is the reason for her happiness. Seeing the hand of the fetus coming out of her stomach is good news for her that her marriage contract is approaching completion and the stability she enjoys. As well as seeing the opening of the belly of an unmarried girl and the fetus coming out of her in a dream. It is a sign of good things that will change the course of her life for the better. Seeing a newborn baby coming out of her stomach in a dream. It is considered a sign of achieving all the goals she seeks. An unmarried girl saw the fetus leaving her stomach and this was accompanied by pain. This is an indication of the sins and disobedience that he commits and he must return to God. A dream about a man leaving the fetus from the womb of an unmarried girl can be a sign of the death of a family member, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream Interpretation Follow the dream of the fetus coming out of the womb in a dream about a married woman If a married woman sees a dream about the fetus coming out of the womb in a dream. This reflects the happy events that will happen to you in the coming days. This vision also promises her good news and the abundance of livelihood that will come to her. If she sees that the features of pregnancy appear on her stomach, this indicates the ambitions that she will achieve and the ambitions that she wants. The dream of the fetus's hand coming out in a dream for a married woman can be an expression of the changes in her life that will affect her positively. A married woman's dream of the fetus's legs coming out of her stomach is a sign of her pregnancy in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman who has not yet given birth with a fetus coming out of her womb expresses her desire to become pregnant. This vision in a married woman's dream is nothing but an expression of the crises and fears she is going through. Interpretation of a dream about the fetus coming out of the abdomen in a dream about a divorced woman A divorced woman sees a dream about the fetus coming out of the womb in a dream. It expresses a change in her life for the better, at the family or financial level. A divorced woman sees that the fetus comes out of her stomach accompanied by pain. It indicates that it is an expression of the difficulties she faces that have disturbed her life. Dream The exit of the fetus from the womb in the dream of a divorced woman and feeling her pulse. She says that she went through a period in her life that was full of problems. When a divorced woman dreams of the fetus exiting her womb. It is a sign of bad news that reaches her, so she returns to her with sadness and sorrow. If she sees a fetus coming out of her womb, and she holds his hand, this is evidence of her return to her husband, and the improvement of the situation between them. Likewise, a divorced woman dreams of a male fetus coming out of her womb. An indication of the end of the differences that she was experiencing with her ex-husband. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of carrying twins for a married woman who is not pregnant Interpretation of seeing the fetus coming out of the womb in a dream for a man and its meaning If a man sees a dream of

title: Interpretation of a dream about transferring the dead to the living

preview.html: It was said that it could mean a difference from the various interpretations that we will explain in the content of the article presented by our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing carrying dead people in the neighborhood in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is taking something from the deceased, then her vision showed more gifts. And good things are on their way. Seeing a dead man giving an unmarried girl copies of the Qur’an is considered one of the most beautiful good visions, God willing. Such a dream was said to be evidence of the dead person’s need to read the Holy Qur’an or give charity. That is, in short, the good deeds that the living can do for the dead. Then they give their reward to the dead person. If a girl sees a dead person she knows coming in a dream and taking her away, then this dream means that she needs her prayers, and God knows best. Seeing a dead person taking insight could mean that there is a message that the dead person wants to give to the dreamer. And he should think carefully. In the thing or message that he wants to convey to her, because he knows best about her situation and therefore knows what is required. See also: Interpretation of dreams of giving the beard a dead fish. Interpretation of seeing the dead controlling the living in a dream for a married woman. In the event that a married woman sees in a dream that the deceased has taken her husband. Her vision was that she and her husband would earn a living, and God knows best. It was said: It means that the dead person sees something in a dream. It is evidence of livelihood on her way to the dreamer and she will give her husband from this livelihood. As the vision means that the livelihood is hers, and therefore the husband gets a share of that livelihood. And God knows best. But if she saw in her dream that her husband was sitting with the dead person and walked with him to the place where the dead person was taking him, then this dream means a dispute between them. That is, there is a dispute or a dispute will occur between her and her husband, but with a lot of supplication it is certainly possible to change fate, so it will go away. There is a dispute about them. Taking a living dead person in a dream for a married woman may indicate some stumbling in matters, but they calm down after that. There are some commentators who said that transporting a living dead person to a spacious place means relief after serious distress, and this breakthrough is for a married woman with a vision. Interpretation of seeing the dead taking the living in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a married man sees a dead person in a dream, he sits with him and takes him away. The vision shows a wide benefit that he will obtain as a result of his fear of God in everything. Some commentators said that seeing the dead taking the living in a dream for a man suggests interpretations Different. The first interpretation is based on the state of the dreamer, that is, if the dreamer’s state is righteousness in his life, that is, he fears God. He does not do bad deeds or oppress anyone, and he does not eat anyone’s money, then his vision means that he will achieve goodness in the near future, and God knows best. While the vision, if it is about a man, and in his life he tries to change it, but at the same time he ignores the subject of the man. That is, there is someone who was wronged by the dreamer and did not return the rights that he had to the dreamer or his companions if they were a group. To see here is to alert him, so He must take the initiative to restore rights. Otherwise, he will get into trouble

Interpretation of seeing the dead taking the living in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a married man sees a dead person in a dream, he sits with him and takes him away. The vision shows a wide benefit that he will obtain as a result of his fear of God in everything. Some commentators said that seeing the dead taking the living in a dream for a man suggests interpretations Different. The first interpretation is based on the state of the dreamer, that is, if the dreamer’s state is righteousness in his life, that is, he fears God. He does not do bad deeds or oppress anyone, and he does not eat anyone’s money, then his vision means that he will achieve goodness in the near future, and God knows best. While the vision, if it is about a man, and in his life he tries to change it, but at the same time he ignores the subject of the man. That is, there is someone who was wronged by the dreamer and did not return the rights that he had to the dreamer or his companions if they were a group. To see here is to alert him, so He must take the initiative to restore rights. Otherwise, he will get into trouble
